creditline: Mr. and Mrs. Bernard M. Granum Fund
description: portrait of a Native American male dressed in traditional clothes holding a rifle at his side with the proper right hand; image is from waist up; man's face seen in profile as he is looking to his proper left side
markings: \'Plate 170\', in ink, ULC border; \'HORSE CAPTURE--ATSINA/From Copyright Photograph 1908 by E. S. Curtis/Photogravure John Andrew & Son\', in ink, below image at border
portfolio: From Plate 170 from "The North American Indian"
title: Horse Capture -- Atsina
